column6: We've been to Earth for street level Marvel fun. We've been to the Nine Realms for fantasy Marvel fun. Next up: deep space, for (er) deep space Marvel fun. Can Kieron and Marguerite resist the chance to write the characters from last year's awesome summer blockbuster? Clue: Rhymes with Nardians of the Galaxy. (Of course not, you silly bears.)
column8: | writer:Marguerite Bennett | writer:Kieron Gillen | penciller (cover):Stephanie Hans | artist:Phil Jimenez
